articles.headline: Silicon Valley Is Trying Out a New Mantra: Make a Profit
articles.snippet: Start-up investors are warning of a reckoning after the stumbles of some high-profile “unicorns.” Now turning a profit is in.
articles.abstract: Start-up investors are warning of a reckoning after the stumbles of some high-profile “unicorns.” Now turning a profit is in.
articles.lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — Fred Wilson, a venture capitalist at Union Square Ventures, recently published a blog post titled “The Great Public Market Reckoning.” In it, he argued that the narrative that had driven start-up hype and valuations for the last decade was now falling apart.

articles.headline: Trump’s Trade War Could Put Swiss-Size Dent in Global Economy, I.M.F. Warns
articles.snippet: The International Monetary Fund is the latest global organization to warn of growing economic fallout from President Trump’s trade war.
articles.abstract: The International Monetary Fund is the latest global organization to warn of growing economic fallout from President Trump’s trade war.
articles.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — The new head of the International Monetary Fund warned on Tuesday that America’s trade war with China could cost the global economy around $700 billion by 2020 — a loss equivalent to the size of Switzerland’s entire economy.

articles.headline: Trump’s Ukraine Call Was ‘Crazy’ and ‘Frightening,’ Official Told Whistle-Blower
articles.snippet: The whistle-blower wrote a memo describing an official who heard the call as “visibly shaken” by it.
articles.abstract: The whistle-blower wrote a memo describing an official who heard the call as “visibly shaken” by it.
articles.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — A White House official who listened to President Trump’s July phone call with Ukraine’s leader described it as “crazy,” “frightening” and “completely lacking in substance related to national security,” according to a memo written by the whistle-blower at the center of the Ukraine scandal, a C.I.A. officer who spoke to the White House official.

articles.headline: Facebook’s Hands-Off Approach to Political Speech Gets Impeachment Test
articles.snippet: The company’s handling of a Trump campaign ad with unsubstantiated accusations about Joseph Biden foreshadows a continuing fight over misinformation.
articles.abstract: The company’s handling of a Trump campaign ad with unsubstantiated accusations about Joseph Biden foreshadows a continuing fight over misinformation.
articles.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — The 30-second video ad released by the Trump campaign last week is grainy, and the narrator’s voice is foreboding. Former Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr., it says, offered Ukraine $1 billion in aid if the country pushed out the man investigating a company tied to Mr. Biden’s son.

articles.headline: Behind Amazon’s Sudden Change in Its Film Strategy
articles.snippet: After poor box-office numbers for Mindy Kaling’s “Late Night,” the company shrank its ambitious release plan for a big fall movie, “The Aeronauts.”
articles.abstract: After poor box-office numbers for Mindy Kaling’s “Late Night,” the company shrank its ambitious release plan for a big fall movie, “The Aeronauts.”
articles.lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — “The Aeronauts,” an adventure film about swashbuckling 19th-century hot-air balloonists, was built for the big screen. Led by an Oscar winner, Eddie Redmayne, and a “Star Wars” star, Felicity Jones, it has real cinematic sweep, with sequences that take place miles above sea level. In May, Amazon Studios announced that the movie would play exclusively on IMAX screens for a one-week engagement before “a full theatrical run.”

articles.headline: What Joe Biden Learned at the Last Two Impeachments
articles.snippet: Until Wednesday, he had resisted calling for President Trump’s impeachment. His experience as a senator helps explain his restraint.
articles.abstract: Until Wednesday, he had resisted calling for President Trump’s impeachment. His experience as a senator helps explain his restraint.
articles.lead_paragraph: President Richard M. Nixon was running low on bipartisan allies.

articles.headline: Turkey Launches Offensive Against U.S.-Backed Syrian Militia
articles.snippet: President Trump condemned the attack on the Kurdish-led militia, which began days after he had greenlighted it.
articles.abstract: President Trump condemned the attack on the Kurdish-led militia, which began days after he had greenlighted it.
articles.lead_paragraph: BEIRUT, Lebanon — Turkey launched a ground and air assault on Wednesday against a Syrian militia that has been a crucial American ally in the fight against ISIS, days after President Trump agreed to let the operation proceed.
articles.byline: By Ben Hubbard and Carlotta Gall

articles.headline: Assailant Live-Streamed Attempted Attack on German Synagogue
articles.snippet: A gunman tried to enter a synagogue in Germany during Yom Kippur, the holiest day on the Jewish calendar, in what officials called an anti-Semitic attack.
articles.abstract: A gunman tried to enter a synagogue in Germany during Yom Kippur, the holiest day on the Jewish calendar, in what officials called an anti-Semitic attack.
articles.lead_paragraph: BERLIN — A heavily armed gunman with a live-streaming head camera tried to storm a synagogue in eastern Germany on Wednesday as congregants observed the holiest day in Judaism. Foiled by a locked door, he killed two people outside and wounded two others in an anti-Semitic spree that smacked of far-right terrorism.
articles.byline: By Melissa Eddy, Rick Gladstone and Tiffany Hsu
